conversations.body_text: Hi Stos El-Marazki,    If you have adjusted the brakeâ€™s mechanical structure or damping, please click the Offset button in the software and follow the on-screen steps to reset the initial pressure signal (ensure the white bar returns to 0%), then recalibrate the pedal.  If the issue persists, please record a video and share it with us via Google Drive, making sure the link access is set to viewable, so we can further analyze and assist you.

Hi Simsonn,
